alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Seminole, east central Lake and south central Volusia Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cassia, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Sanford, DeLand, Lake Mary and Orange City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Seminole
